I'm not a huge fan of Southwest, although I'll give credit where credit is due, and that bags fly free thing is genius. Combine one of my least favorite carriers with what is probably my least favorite airport and you've got a recipe for di
explanation: The review highlights frequent negative experiences with Southwest and Sky Harbor, including delays and inconvenience, and describes the overall experience as a 'recipe for disaster,' indicating dissatisfaction and limited positives, which aligns with a low rating.

review_text:
Food wise, this is my favorite Lenny's location. They make the perfect jalapeno cheese burger. The fries are really good too.

The location kind of sucks. Its  surrounded by a greyhound station, a liquor store and some kind of AA hall. Need I say more?
explanation: The review expresses strong satisfaction with the food quality, calling it their favorite location and praising the burger and fries. However, the negative comment about the location's surroundings indicates some inconvenience, which prevents a perfect score but does not significantly detract from the overall positive experience.

review_text:
I created a monster when I brought my family to Chipotle for the first time many years ago. I am constantly taking one for "the team" when I am dragged here by my wife and one of my sons. 

I usually get the carnitas tacos with the salsa that has the little tomatoes, onions and cilantro. I even pony up an extra $1.80 for the guacamole. I just wish there was the option of adding tomatoes to your taco without the onions and cilantro. How can you eat a taco without tomatoes and guacamole?
explanation: The review shows some dissatisfaction with limited customization options and minor complaints about the food, but overall the tone is neutral and does not indicate severe disappointment or high praise, leading to a balanced rating of 3.

review_text: We stayed at the Pointe Hilton over the July 4th weekend are were very impressed with the amazing pool facilities and poolside food service.  However, I would send caution to anyone planning to stay at this hotel: if you do not have children, this probably is not the place for you.  Screaming children swarmed every corner of this massive resort!  So if you're looking for more relaxation and less SpongeBob, I'd suggest checking out the other hotel options in Phoenix.
explanation: The review highlights positive aspects like pool facilities and food service but also mentions significant noise and disturbance from children, which affects the overall experience. The mixed feedback and neutral tone suggest an average rating around 3.

review_text:
I reeeeaaalllyyyyy wish that I could give this a 4, but I can't do that in good conscience.  The food was great, but the service was downright abysmal.

In a fit of random adventurousness, I thought it would be fun to try a new kind of food for me.  I'm typically a weenie and afraid of anything "weird" so this is a big deal for me.  We drove out here on Friday night and at around 6 or so the restaurant was about half full.  We stood at the door for entirely too long while we waited to be seated.
explanation: The review praises the food quality but highlights poor service, which limits the rating to a middle score according to Yelp's rules.

review_text:
Mixteca was OK. Kind of a cross between Baja Fresh and Robertos. The quesadilla was decent and the beef tacos were good also, just nothing spectacular. I would go up the street to "Carumbas" for something better.
Doesn't accept AMEX:(
explanation: The review describes the food as decent and nothing spectacular, indicating an average experience. There are no major complaints about service or quality, but the lack of enthusiasm and the suggestion to go elsewhere for better options imply a neutral to slightly below average rating.

review_text: Threw a friend's baby shower here and it went pretty smoothly. We made reservations well in advance, and it was a small party. I'm not a huge fan of their food but it's always busy so clearly other people don't have my same opinion. The three stars is for the service, they were super attentive and everything was taken care of for our party. I just don't think the cheesecake is that great, I'm sorry! But the apps aren't too bad.
explanation: The review mentions good service and a smooth event, but criticizes the food quality, especially the cheesecake, and indicates a neutral overall experience, leading to a balanced 3-star rating.

review_text: Not the newest or the nicest but, everything you need and usually no wait for machines. The staff is super nice and there are magazines to read while your there. If they could just turn up the AC a little bit and put ESPN on more than two of the TVs.
explanation: The review mentions that everything needed is available and the staff is friendly, indicating a generally positive experience. However, it also notes some comfort issues like the AC and limited TV options, and no strong enthusiasm or high praise, which suggests a satisfactory but not exceptional experience, leading to a rating of 3.

review_text: I have never been into soul food per se, but my husband woke up craving some chicken and waffles, and well, you can guess where we ended up. We were so pumped that there was Kool Aid on the menu, so we ordered that immediately. I don't know why every restaurant doesn't do this... Kool Aid is amazing. The service was decent - our waitress was quite friendly, and the food came out quick. I got biscuits and gravy, which was pretty delish. The gravy was thick and filling. So filling, in fact, that I
explanation: The review describes decent service and some enjoyable food but also mentions a disappointing side dish, and the overall rating is a solid 3, indicating an average experience with some positives.

review_text:
My niece want to go here for her birthday, on a Friday night.  The wait was about 30 min.  

The onion blossom was not as crispy as I remember but still pretty good. Its horseradish sauce was stronger than I expected.  I had to ask for a side of ketchup.  

My steak was cooked as ordered (medium rare) but lacked taste somehow; the lobster tail was grilled right.  The steak of my niece was on the dry side (overcooked). My daughter's steak was as she liked it (medium rare).

For dessert, we shared
explanation: The review mentions friendly service and good food overall, but notes issues like overcooked steaks and a wait time that is acceptable but not exceptional, leading to a neutral overall experience.

review_text: I love Cheuvronts and have been going there regularly for years. Why only three stars then? Over the past year and a half the service has gone downhill. I find that the servers are impersonal and rigid, and sometimes a little pompous. After three or four bad experiences in a row I just don't go there anymore. They do have great cheese plates and a fantastic happy hour...just don't catch them when they have a special event going on.
explanation: The review mentions positive aspects like great cheese plates and a fantastic happy hour, but overall experience has declined due to impersonal service and repeated bad experiences, leading to a neutral rating of 3.

review_text:
Went here on Wednesday to take advantage of the $30 certificate. It was quite busy, which probably shouldn't of been a shock, location and all, so had to wait awhile but that is the risk of not getting reservations right? =P. 

Anyways, spent time in the bar which was nice, the bartenders were willing to answer questions, though not always the most chatty, but I think that was due more to how busy it was then not being friendly. The happy hour prices looked pretty good, $2 hot sake, $3 beer, $4-
explanation: The review mentions some positive aspects like friendly staff, good happy hour prices, and enjoyable communal seating, but also notes disappointment with the show and the food quality, and suggests the experience is mainly worth it with a discount. Overall, it reflects a mixed experience with moderate satisfaction.

review_text: Went here for lunch on a weekday and thought it'd be busier. The slower setting allowed for more personal attention though. The chef even came out to talk to us and gave us free samples of some of the desserts. The food was good, but didn't blow me away. I think it's a nice option for a snazzier (it's a little pricey) lunch with friends.
explanation: The review mentions good food, attentive service, and a pleasant experience, with some acknowledgment of the price being a bit high. There are no significant negatives or service failures, leading to a mostly positive rating.

review_text: Well....it is what you can expect from airport food.  Not that great but not terrible.  All I wanted was a simple sandwhich to take on the plane with me.  This airport does not have the best in choices, Starbucks, Wendys, Pizza Hut, etc.  This little place is literally a kiosk in terminal C.  It is good if you are in a rush and just want something cold for later.
explanation: The review indicates a mediocre experience with airport food, mentioning it is 'not that great' but acceptable for a quick snack, which suggests a generally negative or lukewarm impression. There are no positive signals like satisfaction or recommendations, and the mention of limited options and being 'literally a kiosk' implies a lack of quality or ambiance. Service or quality issues are not explicitly mentioned, but the overall tone points to a below-average experience, leading to a rating of 2.

review_text:
Loved the location at atmosphere of this place!  Had a very nice business dinner here last night.  We were able to sit outside thanks to the gorgeous weather, and I'd recommend this to anyone.  The houses inside have their charm, but al fresco dining is great!  

We had a few drinks at the bar before we started dinner - they have a fairly nice wine by the glass list, as well as a nice stocked bar.  Something for everyone!

The menu contained lots of delicious choices, and it was hard to choose.
explanation: The review is overall positive, praising the atmosphere, food, and drinks, with polite service noted. However, minor issues with timing and service flow prevent a perfect score, leading to a 4-star rating.

review_text:

explanation: The review is generally positive, praising the food and service, with only minor criticism about dry chicken pieces and a slightly slow service during a busy time, which does not significantly detract from the overall experience.

review_text: Not much to write here. I always park on the Sears (upper level) side when I visit Chandler mall. My last visit to the mall, I ended up buying a luggage set on sale at Sears. The cashier was helpful and even checked to see if all four pieces were present (I didn't even think to, LOL). Four stars. No negative feedback to report.
explanation: The review is positive, highlighting helpful service and a good experience, with no negative feedback reported, leading to a high rating of 4.

review_text:
There's not much more I can say about Rula that hasn't already been said. Except, I guess, I can tell you why I like this place. I like it for two glorious words: HAPPY + HOUR. 

Yes, those two words matters so much to me. Rula offers 1/2 off all appetizers and discounts on pints. What could be better? I say try the brie, for it comes with an unbelievable apple chutney. If you're looking to split an entree with a friend, opt for the lamb stew - served with a side of soda bread. The stew is heart
explanation: The review is highly positive about the food and atmosphere, with strong praise for the food quality and happy hour deals. While it mentions some negatives like noise and limited live music, these do not significantly detract from the overall satisfaction, leading to a mostly positive rating.

review_text:
Want a unique date night?  Craving for something to do on your own?  Want to have an avenue to express your inner artistic abilities?  OK, here you go!

Very interesting concept: Pick a piece of pottery, think of what you would like to design on it, you can draw your idea on with pencil, go grab your paints, brush, sponges, or stencils, and away you go.  They will then fire & glaze it, ready to pick up your masterpeice in a few days,

A great place to zen out and leave all your stress and worrie
explanation: The review highlights a positive experience with a unique and enjoyable activity, but the negative comment about an intrusive staff member and the mention of a ruined experience suggest some dissatisfaction, leading to a balanced rating of 3.

review_text: Good food and freindly staff. They have a nice selection on the menu. After seeing the table next to me I wish I'd of had the house specialty....blueberry pancakes. Next time........
explanation: The review is positive, highlighting good food and friendly staff, with a suggestion to try the house specialty next time. There are no negative comments or service issues, indicating a generally satisfying experience.

review_text: Food is great, but they use to let you get the happy hour specials for take out, but not anymore. I love their prime rib burger, if you have a few extra bucks to spend on the best burger in the world than go here.
explanation: The review highlights great food and a favorite burger, indicating a positive experience. Although there is a minor disappointment about the loss of takeout specials, the overall tone is enthusiastic and recommends the restaurant, justifying a 4-star rating.

review_text:
Eh?  How have I not written a review for Matt's?  I went there a while back, but thankfully it won't be hard for me to recall the experience!

Place - Small.
Food - Fantastic.
Wait - Usually.
Bathroom - An adventure.

We didn't have too long of a wait when we went, but that was entirely luck. I've seen crazy waits here, which is just par for the course when the food is good. Most of it is local and very, very good. Service was fast, and spot on.

The bathrooms are next door in an old motel. Appa
explanation: The review highlights fantastic food, fast service, and a positive overall experience, with only minor issues like wait times and bathroom quirks, which do not significantly detract from the overall satisfaction.

review_text: Our visit to Scottsdale brought us into Fountain Hills to look for a home. While we were there we decided to look at the beautiful fountain we heard so much about. That's when we happened upon this place. The pizza was fantastic!!! It made us want to move here even more. Delicious!
explanation: The review is highly positive, praising the pizza as fantastic and delicious, with no negative comments or issues mentioned, indicating a strong satisfaction and likely a 5-star rating.

review_text: The food here was really good. I ordered the sesamie chicken and the sauce was very good. The service was marginal at best but it didn't annoy me. I'd go back
explanation: The review praises the food quality and expresses willingness to return, indicating a positive experience. Service was marginal but did not significantly detract from the overall satisfaction, supporting a 4-star rating.

review_text:
I used to work near here and we got take out a lot. 

My favorites: spinach enchiladas, green corn tamale, chicken mini chimis ( they come with a green chile cream cheese dip, OMG). 

I loved their tex mex spin, not authentic Mexican, mind you, but tasty. 

I can't speak to the service, I rarely went in to pick up, even... I'm one of those crafty people who can get others to do that, lol. 

I liked it though.
explanation: The review is positive, highlighting tasty food and a good experience, with no mention of service issues or major complaints, indicating a high rating but not perfect due to lack of detailed service feedback.

review_text:
Cevapi and Burek oh my!! Plus I got to hang with my fabulous friend Amra! Score! We wanted something extra good to eat after finishing our Mud Factor race on Saturday and lord knows I have been craving some Cevapi so off we went to Euro Bakery. It was already bookmarked as a place I wanted to try so this was a win, win in my book. 

Everything is made fresh to order and once you walk in, you can smell the fresh baked bread that they have made throughout the day. There is also a mini grocery stor
explanation: The review is enthusiastic and highlights fresh, quality food with a positive experience, and the reviewer plans to return. There are no negative signals or service issues mentioned, supporting a high rating but not perfect due to the lack of explicit superlatives or exceptional service comments.

review_text:
I love this outdoor mall.  It's clean, it's open and has a wonderful restaurant selection.  It doesn't have a huge amount of stores but the stores it does have fits the bill. Now that it has J Crew life got a little sweeter.  I really miss the Border book store, however. 

Some cool Biltmore activities are yoga in the park and movies in the park.  The movies are usually classics and happen during the fall.  Another bonus, is it's super dog friendly.  If you have a four legged friend to walk arou
explanation: The review highlights positive aspects such as cleanliness, variety of restaurants, dog-friendliness, and enjoyable activities, indicating a generally favorable experience. There are no significant complaints or mentions of poor service or quality issues, supporting a high rating. However, the mention of missing a favorite store suggests some minor disappointment, preventing a perfect score.

review_text: Nice bowling alley.  I liked it alot and the staff was very helpful when we could not figure stuff out!  The flatscreens with the score were nice and the animation of Pros were a nice upgrade. We came when their was a deal which was nice.  Thursday- 5 buck cover and free shoes,dollar games, popcorn, beer, and hot dogs all night.... all I gotta say it\s that I did my damage!  The set up for finding a v\ball was far nicer than any other alley I have been to!  Very out of thew way and easy to find
explanation: The review is very positive, highlighting helpful staff, good atmosphere, and value deals, with no mention of significant issues or dissatisfaction, leading to a high rating.

review_text: The cookies and breakfast pastries are to die for.  Just for those two items they deserve four stars.  Everything else, however, is just OK.  The rest of their foods are good but not great.  If you've ever been to Wildflower, I think their food is better there but dang, I can go to Paradise and just pig-out on their cookies!
explanation: The review praises the cookies and pastries highly but considers the rest of the food only average, indicating a mixed experience. The overall tone suggests moderate satisfaction without strong enthusiasm, leading to a neutral rating of 3.

review_text: I went to Khai Hoan yesterday and ordered the rare beef pho.  Now, this is the first time I have had pho before and I would say it is much like a glorified bowl of Ramen Noodles.  That said, it was good.  To me, not great, just good.  We got the combination appetizer plate.  The spring roll was amazing.  The crab was great.  I didn't like the "egg roll" as much as I thought I would, but it was definitely fresh.  I had fresh coconut juice to drink and it was delightful.  I would go back again for
explanation: The review describes the food as good and mentions a positive experience with some dishes, but also notes that the pho was only 'good' and not great. The reviewer plans to return but would order different items, indicating moderate satisfaction without strong enthusiasm.

review_text:
The Paseo Trail travels through Chandler along the Consolidated Canal.  It runs mostly N-S, connecting to other trails along the canal in Mesa and Gilbert, totaling around 18 miles.

The trail is mostly paved on the east side of the canal and pea gravel hard pack on the west side.  It runs along subdivisions, golf courses and even a couple farms.  The grade is very gentle throughout.  I would consider the trail primarily for use by joggers, bicyclists and equestrians.

There is parking at the ad
explanation: The review provides detailed information about the trail's features and accessibility but does not mention any positive or negative experiences with amenities or safety. The lack of strong praise or complaints results in a neutral, average rating.

We ended up talking with some weirdo local chick, thought they were trying to do some kind of bizarre swinger plot, and they kicked rocks. explanation: The review mentions enjoying karaoke and having a good time drinking, with some positive comments about the atmosphere and drinks. However, it also includes negative impressions about the crowd and a confusing comment from a friend, indicating a mixed experience. Service and overall quality are not strongly praised, leading to a balanced rating.

review_text:
This place isn't the best looking, but it's pretty tasty! I find myself craving the strange mix of foods they serve here.
I order the Emerald chicken burrito and the Jerk Chicken quesadillas.
The best part is if you've never been there before, they give you tons of samples and tell you all about the foods you can order. 
I wish they had more locations :)
explanation: The review highlights tasty food, positive experiences with samples and staff, and expresses a desire to visit more locations, indicating a mostly positive experience with minor issues.

review_text: I have visited Windsor twice now and I would describe it as fun, trendy, and a little hipster. The drinks are great, good combinations with fresh, unexpected ingredients. I love the 80's soundtrack, my only complaint is that it was a bit too loud at night, so you had to scream to talk. The food is very good, kind of a modern take on comfort food. The brown bag chicken sandwich had a lot of flavor and the mac and cheese is done really well, just the amount of flavor and creaminess. The crab cake
explanation: The review highlights positive aspects such as good drinks, flavorful food, and a fun atmosphere, indicating a mostly positive experience. While the loudness was a minor inconvenience, it does not significantly detract from the overall satisfaction, leading to a rating of 4.

review_text:
Good food, decent price and a southwestern atmosphere. 

The food is decidedly better than the decor, but then again I've never been big on the southwestern look. Something about Antlers above my head while I'm trying to have a romantic night out with the lady just doesn't cut it for me. 

I (like most everyone else) recommend the big ass burger. You can't go wrong with their side of mac and cheese either and I recommend giving it a go regardless of how much you fill yourself with all their othe
explanation: The review is generally positive, praising the food and recommending specific dishes, with only minor comments about decor and atmosphere. There are no significant service or quality issues mentioned, leading to a mostly positive rating.

review_text:

For under $5 you get chicken  that is juicy and flavorful and a plateful of tasty sides and condiments. Wrap it all up in one of the piping hot tortillas that comes with your meal and enjoy.

explanation: The review highlights high food quality, good value, and positive patronage, with no mention of negative issues, indicating a mostly positive experience that warrants a 4-star rating.

After a short afternoon of shopping, I and the other Musketeers ventured into CD in search of yummy goodness... we weren't disappointed. We scarfed down the Pretzel and
explanation: The review is highly positive, praising the food and atmosphere, with only minor service and timing issues mentioned, which do not significantly detract from the overall experience.

i love this place and their food!
what i mainly love is that their prices are extremely reasonable now so i can go more often.
their steaks are very good as are their ribs and chicken
as for appetizers, i love the signature Bloomin' onion and i recently tried their wings and i love them! it must be the seasonings and sauce

and the service is alway excellent

review_text:
Fun place to get masks for all my robberies.

I joke. but really you can get good masks at Easley's.
explanation: The review is humorous and positive about the masks, but the joking tone and lack of detailed praise or strong enthusiasm suggest a neutral to slightly positive experience, resulting in a 3-star rating.

explanation: The review highlights positive aspects such as prompt service, amenities, discounts, and convenience, with only minor mentions of waiting times. There are no significant complaints or service failures, leading to a mostly positive rating.

But the workers there are nice enough to let me know what I did wrong in a polite way. Give me t

review_text:

explanation: The review highlights enjoyable music, good food, and a positive atmosphere, with a clear intention to return, indicating a mostly positive experience. review_text: This place is GREAT! I must have passed it a million times without knowing that it was tucked away in the complex. The sushi was awesome, the drinks were very reasonabally priced, we loved the decor and the atmosphere was very nice, kinda romantic if you are seated in the back away from the sushi bar. The service was great! We will definitely be going back.
explanation: The review is highly positive, praising the food, drinks, decor, atmosphere, and service, and expressing a strong intention to return, indicating a top rating.

explanation: The review is mostly positive, highlighting enjoyment of the exhibits, good value, and informative content, with no significant service or quality issues mentioned.

There have to be some considerations made when attending Frank and Lupe's: First off, you have to understand that it's not GREAT Mexican food. That is to say, it's not real high quality, but more of what you would get at your buddies grandma's house. The second is that the service is somewhat spotty at times. You give your order to the "waiter", who then disappears as you are serviced throughout the nite by the "bus boys". Getting the check is the hardest thing there is. 

Having said all that,
explanation: The review highlights that the food is tasty and enjoyable, but mentions service issues and that the food quality is not high, which limits the rating to a moderate score. The overall positive comments about the food and value suggest a decent experience, but the service and quality concerns prevent a higher rating.

review_text: So much food to choose from on the menu! They have so many options (healthy eater,unhealthy eater,  vegetarian, breakfast, lunch, etc)  for every kind of diner. I tried an omlet with turkey and brie and I enjoyed it very much. The orange juice was fresh. I was expecting very large portions but they are more than perfect for a super hungry appetite. Service was very good.
explanation: The review highlights a positive experience with good service, variety, and enjoyable food, indicating satisfaction. There are no negative signals or service failures mentioned, supporting a high rating, but the absence of enthusiastic superlatives or explicit return intent suggests a solid but not exceptional experience.

review_text: My new favorite Mexican place in Tempe. Love their tacos. Their menu only lists them individually, but feel free to mix and match. I usually go with one camarone and one pescado. The shrimp are small, but there are lots of 'em. And the chunks of fried fish are bigger than the taco itself. Portions are generous - I'd have to skip breakfast to be able to finish more than two. Service is friendly and efficient - easy to get in and out during your lunch hour. Also a great spot for happy hour.
explanation: The review is highly positive, praising the food, portions, and service, with no significant negatives mentioned. The mention of friendly and efficient service and the enthusiasm for the food suggest a strong satisfaction, leading to a 4-star rating.

review_text:
Shame on me for not writing a review sooner.  Dined here with three other friends during our Spring Training trip at the end of March. We had to make reservations about 2 months prior as well.  We arrived for our 6:30pm reservations and the place was packed! The bar was flowing, both dining areas were filled with people and the entry area was bustling.
